Question & Options:
Which of the following statements are true regarding the film production of 'Radhe'?
Options:
A. a) The chase scenes in 'Radhe' were filmed in Goa.
B. b) Khan was involved in the filming of 'Radhe'.
C. c) Mehboob Studios implemented new guidelines for cast and crew.
D. d) All of the above

Which of the following statements are true regarding the film *Radhe* and its production in Goa?
Options:
A. a) The chase scenes featuring Khan were filmed in Goa.
B. b) Patani was involved in the song filmed during the shooting in Goa.
C. c) Hooda participated in the chase scenes filmed in Goa.
D. d) Khan and Patani collaborated on a song during the filming.
Correct Answer:
a) The chase scenes featuring Khan were filmed in Goa. 
 d) Khan and Patani collaborated on a song during the filming.
